meanings.definition: To write or carve words or symbols on a surface.
meanings.sent1: She inscribed her name on the tree with a stick.
meanings.sent2: The artist inscribed a message on the sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel inscribed a secret code on the bark.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was inscribed in the hearts of all who knew her.
meanings.sent5: The memory of that day was inscribed in her mind forever.

meanings.definition: To mark or engrave something with a design or message.
meanings.sent1: He carefully inscribed his initials on the silver locket.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler inscribed a beautiful pattern on the ring.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel inscribed a funny face on the pumpkin.
meanings.sent4: His dedication was inscribed in every stroke of the brush.
meanings.sent5: The ancient runes were inscribed on the stone tablet.
